42b4('bum): la 'gyur/ de la skye ba mi dmigs/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rga shi
42b5('bum): mi dmigs/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rga shi nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
42b6('bum): mi dmigs/ sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
42b7('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la rdul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa mi dmigs/ nul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin ni mi dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi
43a1('bum): migs na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bzod
43a2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur//
43a3('bum): de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
43a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
43a5('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la shes rab
43a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
43a7('bum): tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par dag la 'gyur/ de la nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
43b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa dag la 'gyur/ de la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
43b2('bum): bye stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
43b3('bum): na/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ stong pa
43b4('bum): zhi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
43b5('bum): mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid// dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/
43b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus
43b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta
44a1('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong
44a2('bum): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
44a3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lnga dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
44a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs na/ thog ma dang
44a5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dor
44a6('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa
44a7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong
44b1('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin zhing lta dmigs
44b2('bum): b.rag la 'gyur/ de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
44b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mi dmig
44b4('bum): pastong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa
44b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid
44b6('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
44b7('bum): gal 'gyur/ de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa 'ing bo zhing stong pa nyid kyang mi
45a1('bum): dmigs na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs/
45a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
45a3('bum): de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de
45a4('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
45a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na
45a6('bum): dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams mi dmigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ stobs kyi nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ stobs
45a7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag
45b1('bum): ning kyang mi dpags na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa dag la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i
45b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'phagras pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid la dpam
45b3('bum): bdag la 'gyur/ del 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
45b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ bsam
45b5('bum): gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nid lta dmigs pa dag la 'gyur/ de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs/ tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
45b6('bum): tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/ gzugs
45b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
46a1('bum): bya kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par
46a2('bum): thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/
46a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
46a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i
46a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang
46a6('bum): mi dmigs na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mngon par shes pa rnams
46a7('bum): mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid mi dmigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa dag la 'gyur/
46b1('bum): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid gi dmigs te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal
46b2('bum): gyur/ des gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo 'de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzungs kyi na nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzungs kyi rna rnams kyi de bzhin
46b3('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs
46b4('bum): pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa'i de
46b5('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi
46b6('bum): dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
46b7('bum): lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ snying rje chen po'i
47a1('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
47a2('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/
47a3('bum): de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rgyun tu zhugs bu'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rgyun tu nug
47a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa ga la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nid mi dmigs te/
47a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
47a6('bum): mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
47a7('bum): nyid lha dmigs padag la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/
47b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par gal 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub mi dmigs/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang byang chub zhid kyang mi dmigs na/
47b2('bum): rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/ desal bgyirnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/ rim gyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin ni dmi dmigs te/ la
47b3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/ rnam pacad
47b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
47b5('bum): 'gyur// / bam po gsum pa'o//
47b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gnan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgyan bar len pa med par
47b7('bum): zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams las chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri za dang bral ba skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang
48a1('bum): skra dang mi rnams kyis mi skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyam pa'i chos can drug tu ni ni bar len
48a2('bum): pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyer bkur te/
48a3('bum): thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims srangs bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams bsam gtan bsgrub/ shes rab bsgoms kyang / de dag shes rab kyi pha
48a4('bum): rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas sbyin pa byin te 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin par mi bya'o//
48a5('bum): 'di ni tshul khrims so bdag gis ni bsrungs par bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'o bdag gis ni ba sgoms par bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so bdag gis ni 'artsams par bya'o// 'di
48a6('bum): ni bsam gtan no bdag gis ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis ni bsgoms par bya'o// zhing tha dad par spyod pas/ de dag shes rab kyi pha
48a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsoms/ bsam gtan la
48b1('bum): mnyam par 'jog shes rab bsgoms par byed cing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas tha mi dad pa pa dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so// de dag
48b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom
48b3('bum): pa nyid thob po// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam mtshan ma med pa'am smon pa med pa yod mod kyi de dag shes
48b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs sum bzung na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byas nas nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// gsol pa/
48b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du 'dra yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
48b6('bum): zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
48b7('bum): thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa
49a1('bum): / la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
49a2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' shig bsgom pa ni thabs
49a3('bum): mkhas pa ma thob pas nyan thos rang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
49a4('bum): dang bral ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing
49a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// sha ra da ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya ba'am dpag chad
49a6('bum): gis brgya pa 'am/ dpag chad sum pa'am dpag chad bzhi brgya pa'am/ dpag chad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/ de la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la bya
49a7('bum): de la 'dab ma med pa zhig ste/ 'jam bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas sum nu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam sems/ gal te bye de la/
49b1('bum): nas ma la bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems sam/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas
49b2('bum): par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma
49b3('bum): smas ma snang bar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na/ sha ra dadwa ti'i bu de lta snyam du sems/ bya de 'jam bu gling du ma smas ma snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
49b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das don ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'jas bu gling du lhung nas smras pa'am snang bar yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa 'am 'bum pa la thug par sdug bsngal ga yang
49b5('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lus che la 'dab ma mchis pa de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i
49b6('bum): bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyem du sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus rtsam bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog
49b7('bum): cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i smon pa yang che de'i sems bskyed pa yang tshe yongs su 'dzin pa yang chad med
50a1('bum): du zid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
50a2('bum): lhung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs//
50a3('bum): bzod pa bsgoms brtson 'grus brtsams bsam gtan bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung
50a4('bum): ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
50a5('bum): pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin
50a6('bum): gshegs pa rnams tshul khrims mi shes ting nge 'dzin mi shes/ shes rab mi shes rnam par grol ba mi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na de mi shes
50a7('bum): khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos nas de ni de dag zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing bla na med/
50b1('bum): ba ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro//
50b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
50b3('bum): bsngo ba ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi za'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
50b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa ni
50b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba ste 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
50b6('bum): shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
50b7('bum): la mtshan mar mi 'dzin smon pa med pa'i ti nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
51a1('bum): la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed
51a2('bum): ba nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang mtshan ma bzung / tshul khrims srung kyang mtshan mang ma bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsams kyang
51a3('bum): mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
51a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid
51a5('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /
51a6('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims spang ba dang / mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtson pa dang /
51a7('bum): mtshan ma bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong
51b1('bum): / smra na [] byung bad nganas pa dang /
51b2('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid byung ba nyid du banob pa dang / mngan pa dang rnam pa' sems kyis chen pa stong bzhir bsgom pa dang / mtshan pa dang tham pa'i mas
51b3('bum): kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshanam dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus rgyas stong pa nyid bskam pa dang / mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma bya
51b4('bum): nga la nga / dasanapa da ma thag da
51b5('bum): nga bad padang / mapas shes rang na nga zhid panas
51b6('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thabs cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mdzan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral
51b7('bum): pa'i sems kyis pa panas pa stong pa nyid bsgos pa dang / pa dang rnam pa mams kyis dngas pa bad pa stong pazhid bsgos pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyim nga bzhid
52a1('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
52a2('bum): sems kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdza
52a3('bum): 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams bsgom pa dang /
52a4('bum): byang chu
52a5('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yan lag rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma da /
52a6('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyi
52a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral bI sems kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar
52a8('bum): pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rna ba thar
52b1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
52b2('bum): kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
52b3('bum): rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang /
52b4('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral/
52b5('bum): ba'i sems kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyi sa lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
52b6('bum): kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid bsgob pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang byang chub bsgom pa dang /
52b7('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
53a1('bum): @sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na/
53a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de'i bla na med pa yang
53a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub the tsom ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas
53a4('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/ chor
53a5('bum): ba 'am 'du shes sam 'ang byed dam rnam par shes pa 'am mig gam rna ba 'am sna 'am lce 'am lus sam/ yid dam gzugs sam sgra'am dri'am ro 'am reg gam chos sam/ mig gi rnam par
53a6('bum): shes pa 'am rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sgra'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te/
53a7('bum): reg pa 'am rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus
53b1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba na/
53b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam chu'i khams sam me'i khams sam rlung gi khams samanas
53b3('bum): mkha'i khams sam rnam par shes pa'i khams sas/ ma rig pa 'am 'du byed dam rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam skye mched drug gam reg pa'am/ tshor ba 'am sred pa la/
53b4('bum): len pa 'am sred pa 'am skye ba ldan shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
53b5('bum): byin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dag kyi stong pa nyid dag/ gi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma/ chen gyi
53b6('bum): stong pa nyid de/ dom dam pa stong pa nyid de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba
53b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dam rang bzhing stong pa nyid dam chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/
54a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/
54a2('bum): dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan
54a3('bum): rnams sam tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/
54a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/
54a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas
54a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam rang byang
54a7('bum): chub bam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
54b1('bum): pa'am rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni
54b2('bum): com mchis par rig par bgyi ba ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sbyin pa
54b3('bum): ci dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang / de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang srungs pa dang / bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang
54b4('bum): brtsams pa dang bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar gzung ste/ bsgoms pas/ de'i slad
54b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dog gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom mchis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
54b6('bum): de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol
54b7('bum): tu byen pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang babs mkhas pa la gnas te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa dang /
55a1('bum): @#ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang bar bgyi'o// tshul khrims srung bar bgyi'o// bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// brtson
55a2('bum): 'grus brtsams par bgyi'o// bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bgyi'o// shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o// nang stong pa nyid la sprad par bgyi'o// phyi stong pa nyid
55a3('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid
55a4('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// thog/
55a5('bum): mdang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// chos thams cad stong pa
55a6('bum): nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// mi dmigs pa stong bzhid la spyad par bgyi'o// dngos po stong pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//
55a7('bum): ngawa ga stong pa nyid la spyad par brtsam dngom pa med ma' ba nyid stong pazhid la spyad par bci'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad par ba'agyi'o// yang dag par
55b1('bum): spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
55b2('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//
55b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// mthar gyis gnas
55b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug par rnams la spyad par bci'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyad par bgyi'o// mngon par shes pa rnams/
55b5('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o// ding nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// mi
55b6('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// so so yang dag par rig par rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// snying rje chen po la spyad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
55b7('bum): rnams la spyod par bgyi'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par
56a1('bum): bgyi'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//
56a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sprad par bgyi'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
56a3('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la/ chos de dag kyang ma
56a4('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar bka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//
56a5('bum): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs
56a6('bum): par sangs rgyas te/ don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so// de
56a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag chos thams cad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
56b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag
56b2('bum): gis 'tshal pa dang bdag sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni mi dka'o// de
56b3('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis so// gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang ba rgya ba ma mchis/ gang
56b4('bum): yang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par
56b5('bum): 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
56b6('bum): ni stong pa ste/ chos gang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du'am yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ tshul khrims srung ba 'am/ bzod
56b7('bum): pa bsgom pa 'am/ brtsod 'grus rnam pa 'am/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ shes rab bsgob pa'am dang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ byi stong pa nyid bsgom pani
57a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/
57a2('bum): 'das byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
57a3('bum): bsgom pa 'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
57a4('bum): bsgom pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
57a5('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ dbang po rnams bsgom pa
57a6('bum): 'am/ stobs rnams bsgom pa'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'o//
57a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'am/ tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ mtha
57b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smod pa med pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom
57b2('bum): pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ so so yang
57b3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa 'am/ snying rje chen po bsgom 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
57b4('bum): bsgom pa 'am lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bsgom pa 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa/
57b5('bum): shes pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don tu bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon
57b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
57b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' nan pos/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngan par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar sngam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dis
58a1('bum): s+ya s+ya/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
58a2('bum): 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig ni mig gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba ni rna
58a3('bum): ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid ni yid kyi rang ba
58a4('bum): gyis stong ngo // gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ro ni ro'i rang bzhin gyis
58a5('bum): stong ngo // reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
58a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa
58a7('bum): ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis steng ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam
58b1('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni 'amig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg
58b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'das te reg pa'i rang bzhin
58b3('bum): gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyi
58b4('bum): stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
58b5('bum): byung ba'i tsher bA rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
58b6('bum): ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus
58b7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis sdong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg
59a1('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo do// sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // nu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang
59a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi
59a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
59a4('bum): ngo/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni skye mched drag gi rang
59a5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // len pa ni len pa'i
59a6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong do// na shini na shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
59a7('bum): byin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol
59b1('bum): tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan
59b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
59b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo do// byi stong panyid ni bri stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong // byi nang stong pazhid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis
59b4('bum): sto ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // don dam pa sna
59b5('bum): banyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
59b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // thog pa dang tha ma med
59b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid
60a1('bum): / ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stong ngo do// rang gi
60a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhini stong ngo // dngos po med pa
60a3('bum): stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
60a4('bum): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong
60a5('bum): ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin
60a6('bum): gyis stong ngo / stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
60a7('bum): brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnas
60b1('bum): ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams ni chad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i
60b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
60b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
60b4('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge
60b5('bum): 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong
60b6('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong
60b7('bum): ngo snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs
61a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
61a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
61a3('bum): rang byang chub ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pA nI lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
61a4('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
61a5('bum): 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
61a6('bum): doni 'di ltar nam mkha'i ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// tshe dang
61a7('bum): cha ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di snyam du bdag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa na
61b1('bum): 'chang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ do ni 'di ltar chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
61b2('bum): dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar bur mos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gal te byang chub sems
61b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sA ste/
61b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bka' ba med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang
61b5('bum): mi 'gyur ro// tshedang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ phrin med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar ni bka' ba ste/ mngon par rdzogs
61b6('bum): bar 'ang rgya bar slab ma yin par shes so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
61b7('bum): las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci tshor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
62a1('bum): 'byor de ni ma yin no// 'o na ci 'du shes bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab/
62a2('bum): 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci 'du byed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras
62a3('bum): pa'i na ci rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byangan ba las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
62a4('bum): ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ mig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ni
62a5('bum): ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci sna bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
62a6('bum): byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci lce bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang
62a7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ni lus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras
62b1('bum): pa 'o na ci yid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/
62b2('bum): gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las ldog ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci sgra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
62b3('bum): byang chub las ldog ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'on ci dri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog ma/ smras pa tshe dang
62b4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci ra~M bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras
62b5('bum): pa 'o na ci reg bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci chos bla na med pa yang dag
62b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes
62b7('bum): pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang
63a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rdzogs/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa'on ci sna'i rnam par shes pa bla na/
63a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa'o na ci lce'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par
63a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci lus kyi rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

63a5('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las ldog ma/

63a7('bum): ma yin no// smras pa'o na ci sna'i 'dus te reg pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldogs/ smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa'o na ci lho'i
63b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldogs/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bla na med pa yang dag par/
63b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang du ba las rdzogs/ smras pa che dang ldan parab 'byor don ma yin no// smras pa 'on ci med kyi 'das te reg pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rdzogs
63b3('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang
63b4('bum): chub las ldag ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldogs/

65a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldogags/ spras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa'o na ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
