268b1('bum): mgon no// tshad med pa rnams ni ma'o// chad meng pa rnams ni pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston
268b2('bum): par rig par bya ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
268b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes bya bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
268b4('bum): ni skyabs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams ni mgon no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
268b5('bum): ni pha'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni
268b6('bum): snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam par
268b7('bum): thar pa brgyad ni mgon no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa'
269a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu ni lam mo// mthar gyis nanas
269a2('bum): snyoms par 'jugs pa dgu ni snang ba'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ston ma'o// zla 'o shes pa'o shes rab po// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom pa
269a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu ni dpung gnyen no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mgon no/
269a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
269a5('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
269a6('bum): dang smon pa med pa ni lam mo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa med pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
269a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smom pa med pa ni sgron ma'o// bro'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni dpung
269b1('bum): gnyen no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni srubs so// rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni mgon no//
269b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang smon pa med pa ni pa'o// mngon
269b3('bum): par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo// mngon par shes pa rnams
269b4('bum): ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni skyab so//
269b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269b6('bum): chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni lam mo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sgron ma'o// zlo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//
269b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dpung gnyen no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni skyabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mgon no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nga'o//
270a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni lam chod
270a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// zlo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
270a3('bum): ni skyabs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mgon no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs banin byang chub
270a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni snang ba'o//
270a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
270a6('bum): bcu ni skyabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mgon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pa'o//
270a7('bum): mig 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o//
270b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyabs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon na/
270b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni nga'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/
270b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// so so
270b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
270b5('bum): ni ma'o// teso so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par
270b6('bum): bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni lam mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sgra
270b7('bum): ma'o/ blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni skyabs so//
271a1('bum): / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mgon no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
271a2('bum): bco brgyad ni pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo//
271a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam
271a4('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pa'o// rnam pa thams cad
271a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po
271a6('bum): 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
271a7('bum): ge yang yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
271b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
271b2('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
271b3('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
271b4('bum): rnams te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /
271b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su
271b6('bum): bsdu bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don sbyang ba dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste byang
271b7('bum): chu'i kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / ba dang ma dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang /
272a1('bum): mgon yin no// zhes brjod de/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
272a2('bum): bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
272a3('bum): dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
272a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to// rab 'byor gyis gal pa/
272a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i
272a6('bum): mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang
272a7('bum): med do// gsol pa bcom ldan mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid de chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de ltar mchis sam/
272b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin na// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis
272b2('bum): chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams
272b3('bum): cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang dben pa'i mtshan nyid du gleng gIs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
272b4('bum): pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad
272b5('bum): kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas
272b6('bum): nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byung bar mi 'gyu/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas tshan mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni
272b7('bum): bla na med pan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par 'chang mi rgya/ dben pas na blang ba nyid mchas gang yang mi dmigs/ dben pas
273a1('bum): ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba de lta bu mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de
273a2('bum): don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nang bdag dang bdag
273a3('bum): gis zhes bya ba la spyod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs de de lags te/ bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bas/ sems can
273a4('bum): rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod
273a5('bum): pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang bdag gir bya ba med/ de lta 'dzin pa med/ gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ba med de/
273a6('bum): de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
273a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la mi spod // 'du shes la mi spong // 'du byed la mi spyod// rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// mig la mi sbed/ rna
273a8('bum): ral la mi spyod/
273b1('bum): la mi spyod// snal mi spyod// lce la mi spyod// lus la mi spyod do// yid la mi spyod do// gzugs le mi spyod do// sgra la mi spyod// dril mi sbyong // rol mi spyod/ reg
273b2('bum): la mi spyod// chos la mi spyod// mig gi rnam par shes pa mi spyod// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod// sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spod// lce'i rnam par shes pa
273b3('bum): mi spyod// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi spong // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod// sna'i
273b4('bum): 'dus te re ba la mi spyod// lce'i 'dus te reg lnga mi spyod// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
273b5('bum): gyis tshor ba la mi spyod// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
273b6('bum): tshor ba la mi spyod// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mo spyod do// pa'i khams la mi spyod/
273b7('bum): chu'i khams lo mi sbyong // ma'i khams la mi spyod// rlung gi khams la mi spyod// nam mkha'i khams la me spyod// rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod// ma rig pa la mi spyod/
274a1('bum): 'du byed la mi spyod// rnam par shes pa la mi spong// ming dang gzugs la mi spyod// skyed mched drug la mi spyod// reg pa la mi spyod/
274a2('bum): tshor ba la mi spyod// sred pa la mi spyod// len pa la mi spyod// srid pa la mi spyod// skye ba la mi spyod// rga shi la mi spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byin pa la mi spod// tshul khrims
274a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spong // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spod// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
274a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod// phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod// sto pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spong // chen
274a5('bum): po stong pa nyid la mi spong // don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spong// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod// mtha' las 'ongs pa stong
274a6('bum): pa nyid la mi spyod// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod// chos thams cad
274a7('bum): stong pa nyid la mi spyong // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spod// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod// ngo bo nyid stong pa
274b1('bum): nyid la mi spyod// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la mi spyod// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
274b2('bum): mi spyod/ dbang po rnams la mi spyod// stobs rnams la mi spyod// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do// 'phags
274b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod// bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod// tshad med pa rnams la mi spod// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod// rnam par
274b4('bum): thar pa rnams la mi spyod// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi spyod// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa la mi spod/
274b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spong // ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spong // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi spyod/
274b6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la mi spyod// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod// byams pa chen po la mi spyod// snying rje chen po la mi spyod// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
274b7('bum): babaco brgyad la mi spyong// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi spyod// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod// dgra bcom
275a1('bum): ba nyid la mi spod/ rang byang chub la mi spong // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi spyod// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod//
275a2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang // gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de
275a3('bum): ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste// bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang
275a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na// de ni 'di ltar 'di lha ste
275a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mi gnon pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam thams cad
275a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi gnon pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams
275a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'jam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
275b1('bum): thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam
275b2('bum): 'tshe'i bar du bzhugs pa de la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkar stir byas/ phu dad byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
275b3('bum): yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
275b4('bum): 'phel lam ta/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
275b5('bum): mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang /
275b6('bum): gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spong ba na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
275b7('bum): rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
276a1('bum): n+ya/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la
276a2('bum): zhig gis rim gro byas// bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/
276a3('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs ldang ngo //
276a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang /
276a5('bum): rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
276a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
276a7('bum): thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i
276b1('bum): bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang
276b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
276b3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
276b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'tshod pa dang rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang
276b5('bum): yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong
276b6('bum): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
276b7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du zhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/
277a1('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
277a2('bum): sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'bel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
277a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang /
277a4('bum): rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang // 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277a5('bum): po dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spong na de'i bsod namA ches mang du 'phelo// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
277a6('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par me'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur la/
277a7('bum): de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas
277b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
277b2('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcon ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu
277b3('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed
277b4('bum): pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
277b5('bum): rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi me par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
277b6('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu dkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
277b7('bum): pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
278a1('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la
278a2('bum): rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/
278a3('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo der bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
278a4('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /
278a5('bum): 'chang ba dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams
278a6('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la
278a7('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / ba bas gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa
278b1('bum): bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi las rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
278b2('bum): bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /

278b4('bum): yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
278b5('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /
278b6('bum): 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'brel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston ma/ de'i bsod nams ches
278b7('bum): mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga byi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu
279a1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med

279a6('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
279a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed
279b1('bum): pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams
279b2('bum): cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkong pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi

279b5('bum): pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la bar tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dag pa'i
279b6('bum): rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
279b7('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de

280a3('bum): 'byor gal te / gsus kyi po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag
280a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la

280a7('bum): pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
280b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
280b2('bum): 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rig
280b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang /
280b4('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i
280b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni sems nan gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro
280b6('bum): ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'
280b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni/ sems can gang la yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
281a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can
281a2('bum): thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang ldan par lta ste de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo// de dge rnam par spyod pa des rnam par sbyong bas/ dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang /
281a3('bum): mngon par dga' bar gyur la/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub po// de dag mtshan ma de dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po
281a4('bum): 'thob po// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o//
281a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// bsam gtan
281a6('bum): gyi pha rol tu byin pa ni snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par
281a7('bum): sangs ma rgyas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// de dag shes rab
281b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su zhig gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i
281b2('bum): gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems
281b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams gsum gyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /
281b4('bum): snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bla
281b5('bum): na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par bya'o//
281b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na'ang des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go
281b7('bum): skabs mi dbye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/
281b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sngan chad nor bu rin po che snyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/ des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/
282a1('bum): des nor bu rin po de rnyed pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin po che snyed ma thag tu
282a2('bum): stor bar gyur na/ des rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ rtag du rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu
282a3('bum): rin po che de dang bral bar gyur te zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag tu 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
282a4('bum): chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
282a5('bum): pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar mi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid la
282a6('bum): bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub
282a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa'
282b1('bum): mi dmigs/ yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal
282b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
282b3('bum): ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin
282b4('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas ma yin no zhes
282b5('bum): bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
282b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de la 'phel ba med do// yongs su 'grib pa med do//
282b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub
283a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
283a2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283a3('bum): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba'i yongs su 'grib pa med de/ de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib
283a4('bum): pa med do// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin
283a5('bum): gnyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum mi 'gong mi 'jigs mi
283a6('bum): sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283a7('bum): chen po de ni shes rab kyi phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o//
283b1('bum): bam po bco lnga pa'o// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
283b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyi dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid
283b3('bum): gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom
283b4('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/ bcom ldan
283b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
283b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
283b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid skyong ngam/
284a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi
284a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du shes shes rab
284a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa shes
284a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gastsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
284a5('bum): ci lags mig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
284a6('bum): 'das ci lags sna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
284a7('bum): 'das ci lags lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
284b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
284b2('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs sgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
284b3('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
284b4('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//
284b5('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag
284b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
284b7('bum): skyong dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sde'i rnam pa shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi na/
285a1('bum): par shes pa shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi
285a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
285a3('bum): ci lags mig gi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
285a4('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab
285a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
285a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
285a7('bum): pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i
285b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nor ba shes rab kyi pha rol
285b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
285b3('bum): lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
285b4('bum): tsher ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
285b5('bum): 'das ci lags sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
285b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags me'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
285b7('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags nam mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab
286a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
286a2('bum): ldan 'das ci lags ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
286a3('bum): 'das ji lags rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ming dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
286a4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
286a5('bum): ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sred pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
286a6('bum): 'das ci lags len pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags srid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
286a7('bum): 'das ci lags skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
286b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
286b2('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bzod pa'i pha rol tu
286b3('bum): byin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bsam
286b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
286b5('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi
286b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi nang stong pa
286b7('bum): nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
287a1('bum): ci lags chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
287a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'dus ma byas
287a3('bum): stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
287a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes
287a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
287a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
287a7('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes
287b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos
287b2('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis
287b3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yang dag par spong ba
287b4('bum): bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
287b5('bum): ci lags dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
287b6('bum): ci lags byang chub kyi yan lags bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes rab
287b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag
288a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshad med pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
288a2('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
288a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
288a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
288a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags mngon par shes pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha
288a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de
288a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mi 'jigs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
288b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po shes rab kyi
288b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
288b3('bum): lags rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
288b4('bum): byin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dgra bcom
288b5('bum): pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
288b6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
288b7('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs kyi stong pa
289a1('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba
289a2('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
289a3('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
289a4('bum): dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang
289a5('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs de shes
289a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
289a7('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
289b1('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
289b2('bum): lags 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
289b3('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
289b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
289b5('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
289b6('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyi dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
289b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab
290a1('bum): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa
290a2('bum): nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbying
290a3('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290a4('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lugs rna ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid
290a5('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid

290a7('bum): ci lags sna'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba
290b1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
290b2('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
290b3('bum): dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
290b4('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
290b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
290b6('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings dang /
290b7('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
291a1('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
291a2('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbying dang /
291a3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
291a4('bum): dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs kyi stong
291a5('bum): pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /
291a6('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
291a7('bum): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sgra'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /
291b1('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
291b2('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de
291b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dri'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
291b4('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang //
291b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
291b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ro'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
291b7('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
292a1('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol
292a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis
292a3('bum): pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gan
292a4('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
292a5('bum): ldan 'das ci lags chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /
292a6('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid
292a7('bum): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
292b1('bum): sbal pa/ rab 'byor de ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
292b2('bum): dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
292b3('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
292b4('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso
292b5('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
292b6('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs de shes
292b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
293a1('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang //
293a2('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
293a3('bum): ldan 'das ci lags lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid
293a4('bum): dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyangs dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
293a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
293a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /

293b4('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
293b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan

293b7('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsol
294a1('bum): / nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang //

294a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /

294b7('bum): ba la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi 'dus te/
295a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
295a2('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med

295a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor

295a6('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
295a7('bum): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /

295b3('bum): dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /

295b6('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis bri nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

296a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob
296a2('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhini nyid dang / chos nyid

296a5('bum): sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin

296b6('bum): ldan 'das ci lags rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin

297b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /

297b7('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso bo nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
298a1('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
298a2('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
298a3('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa
298a4('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /

298a6('bum): lags skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /
298a7('bum): nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
298b1('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog
298b2('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
298b3('bum): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
298b4('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tsher ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag
298b5('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
298b6('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
298b7('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sred pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
299a1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
299a2('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
299a3('bum): ci lags len pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de

299b2('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos

299b6('bum): med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
299b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /

307b1('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
