307b3('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob
307b4('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
307b5('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
307b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob
307b7('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
308a1('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
308a2('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
308a3('bum): ga/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis
308a4('bum): pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
308a5('bum): dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
308a6('bum): ldan 'das ci lags mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
308a7('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
308b1('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
308b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /
308b3('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
308b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol
308b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / reg lus pa nyid
308b6('bum): dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
308b7('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/
309a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po
309a2('bum): ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
309a3('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
309a4('bum): 'das ci lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /
309a5('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon
309a6('bum): med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
309a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin
309b1('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med
309b2('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mi 'jig
309b3('bum): pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
309b4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
309b5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags so so yang dag par
309b6('bum): rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma me
309b7('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
310a1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
310a2('bum): byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa
310a3('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
310a4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid
310a5('bum): dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
310a6('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
310a7('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang /
310b1('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de nyid dang /
310b2('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de
310b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang //
310b4('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
310b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab
310b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /
310b7('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
311a1('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de
311a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa
311a3('bum): nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
311a4('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
311a5('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa de
311a6('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
311a7('bum): chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag
311b1('bum): rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
311b2('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
311b3('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid dang / gsos
311b4('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
311b5('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
311b6('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa dang / snying
311b7('bum): bo ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
311b8('bum): ran lus pa nyis
312a1('bum): dang / ma na me shi nga/ pas gyis rgya mas shes kyi na pa spyong
312a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
312a3('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
312a4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
312a5('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi
312a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sem/
312a7('bum): chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
312b1('bum): 'byor do mam du sems/ chos gang dkrigs su med pa de skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur rapa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deni sa lags so// com ldan
312b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang
312b3('bum): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan te/ rab
312b4('bum): 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i
312b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod/ de ltar rtsol te/ de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ye shes
312b6('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
312b7('bum): dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
313a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos tham
313a2('bum): cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur ram/
313a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba'ang ma lags mi skye ba'ang ma lags pa
313a4('bum): las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
313a5('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba 'angamags/ mi skye ba'ang ma lags pa las kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
313a6('bum): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
313a7('bum): pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
313b1('bum): byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom
313b2('bum): ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
313b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu
313b4('bum): bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de
313b5('bum): bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis
313b6('bum): ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
313b7('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/
314a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog go//
314a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
314a3('bum): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du zab po// bcom ldan
314a4('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du
314a5('bum): rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi ba
314a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du zhi
314a7('bum): baphra po zhib par// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa ni shin du dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyir// bcom ldan 'das se
314b1('bum): can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing /
314b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa de
314b3('bum): dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes
314b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang
314b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha
314b6('bum): ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang
314b7('bum): ldan par 'gyur bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/
315a1('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing
315a2('bum): 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed par 'gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs te klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ ke'u
315a3('bum): shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la lA ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char
315a4('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
315a5('bum): bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi
315a6('bum): 'gro'o// grang dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
315a7('bum): smras so// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/
315b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
315b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
315b3('bum): yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems
315b4('bum): dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge
315b5('bum): slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa tshad med pa pa ni
315b6('bum): dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
315b7('bum): chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
316a1('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung ning 'chang ste grags shing kun nub par byas nas kyang
316a2('bum): de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos ste/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
316a3('bum): dpa' chen po des ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang
316a4('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba
316a5('bum): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
316a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems
316a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang thal ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gnon cing 'gro bar
316b1('bum): 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul
316b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag zil gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi
316b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
316b4('bum): ba la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol
316b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
316b6('bum): la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
316b7('bum): tu byin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
317a1('bum): @la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
317a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de skad du bstan pa bzhin du
317a3('bum): spyod pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha mi yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnan par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
317a4('bum): ba la spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
317a5('bum): pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po do na de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed do// de ltar zhugs pa'i
317a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang phang bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba
317a7('bum): rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ gan thos kyi bsas
317b1('bum): ba la slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi
317b2('bum): dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o// kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig/ skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig/ lhung zed bzhi
317b3('bum): po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub du 'jug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ste/
317b4('bum): 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
317b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar
317b6('bum): sems so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma yang mtshe ma'i lha'i
317b7('bum): rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab
318a1('bum): 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
318a2('bum): lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// tshangs pa mi 'byed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// kun snang
318a3('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar
318a4('bum): sems so// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams
318a5('bum): kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems
318a6('bum): so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la skyed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu
318a7('bum): dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di yang de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug
318b1('bum): bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub
318b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa
318b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nang dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi
318b4('bum): 'byung mi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig
318b5('bum): par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes
318b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang
318b7('bum): ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo
319a1('bum): bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa marjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
319a2('bum): mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i
319a3('bum): dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
319a4('bum): pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs so// dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
319a5('bum): la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
319a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ste/ rgyun
319a7('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub theb par 'gyur/
319b1('bum): ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga'
319b2('bum): bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi gzugs
319b3('bum): rngus zug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci
319b4('bum): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum
319b5('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar mda' ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
319b6('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi
319b7('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can 'tshe ba'i
320a1('bum): bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
320a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par
320a3('bum): ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320a4('bum): zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can ga
320a5('bum): ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang thal na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi
320a6('bum): mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi zos so// ma thos pas mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar sgom pa ma
320a7('bum): shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed de/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo
320b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems
320b2('bum): dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems
320b3('bum): dpa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag
320b4('bum): gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gi
320b5('bum): grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu
320b6('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba ni de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis
320b7('bum): glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems
321a1('bum): dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes
321a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang bzung ba dang / klag pa dang bcangs pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig
321a3('bum): ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lha rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//
321a4('bum): dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa bskyed cing // da ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
321a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// da ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
321a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
321a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba ma yin no// khyod
321b1('bum): ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
321b2('bum): pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems su byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//
321b3('bum): dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems su bskyed na/ dga' bo de ni bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spro ba dang
321b4('bum): nyams bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags
321b5('bum): rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu glags par gyur na/ de ming brjod
321b6('bum): pa 'am rus brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag stong gzhan smod la/ phyir mi
321b7('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par/ rnam pa dang
322a1('bum): tshul dang mtshan ma med pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag stod gzhan la spyod de/ 'di skad du 'di ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i
322a2('bum): theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang chub sems
322a3('bum): dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo // zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod la de la bdud sdig
322a4('bum): to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs par mi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
322a5('bum): rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang shin du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdud sdig to
322a6('bum): can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bar sems
322a7('bum): de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na 'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas 'thun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/
322b1('bum): de dag de bzhin du slob pa'i tshe/ de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam
322b2('bum): pa phyin ci log du gyur pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sa las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/
322b3('bum): de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab du 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin ji'i 'jig rten dang / yid dag kyi yul yang rab tu
322b4('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin du 'phel bar 'gyur bas dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spro ba dang / tshim
322b5('bum): pa dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing //
322b6('bum): da ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi khyod ni ma yin no// zhes zer na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
322b7('bum): nying dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zab mo dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang /
323a1('bum): 'chang 'bru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi skye
323a2('bum): gnas kyi lam mo// de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan
323a3('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems de pa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'chang 'thun/ de la
323a4('bum): bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par
323a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams
323a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam
323a7('bum): brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa/ byang chub
323b1('bum): sems dpa' lung ma bston pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru na/ gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs
323b2('bum): su mi gtang zhe na/ ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo
323b3('bum): bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te ma
323b4('bum): lags kyi sa bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs
323b5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo gang zag byang chub sems
323b6('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par
323b7('bum): brjod pa byas nas phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing mkhon du bzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam sa
324a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed da go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
324a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par
324a3('bum): bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems
324a4('bum): can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlogs pa'i tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o// bdag
324a5('bum): gis glen pa dang lkug pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
324a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la
324a7('bum): bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin pas bdag gis de dag la gnod sems mi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o// snyam na dga' bo byang chub sem
324b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags tshol zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do// dga' bo
324b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o//
324b3('bum): 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'dug na yang de su la yang gnod sems mi bya/ 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod
324b4('bum): sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
324b5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
324b6('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang / gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
324b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal po/ dga' bo 'di lta ste ston pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems
325a1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te/ gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji ltar
325a2('bum): bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i ba
325a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa
325a4('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
325a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
325a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po/
325a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
325b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pal
325b2('bum): lam yan lag bachad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
325b3('bum): bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
325b4('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
325b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
325b6('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslabs par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang
325b7('bum): bslabs par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam
326a1('bum): ston pa ste/ gal te 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ldan par 'gyur na/ de la bdag gis
326a2('bum): bslab par mi bya'o gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma thal bar gnas na/ bdag
326a3('bum): gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//
326a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// / le'u bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//
326a5('bum): bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
326a6('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
326a7('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam
326b1('bum): pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor byi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems
326b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// /
326b3('bum): rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
326b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//
326b5('bum): rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang
326b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
326b7('bum): rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang bzhin
327a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub
327a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
327a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po
327a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
327a5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzug
327a6('bum): ni gzugs kyis steng ngo // tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo // 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ngo // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas
327a7('bum): stong ngo // mig ni mig gis stong ngo // rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo // sna ni snas stong ngo // lce ni lces stong ngo // lus ni lus kyis stong ngo // yid ni yid kyis stong ngo //
327b1('bum): gzugs kyi gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra ni sgras stong ngo // dri ni dris stong ngo // ro ni stong ngo // reg ni reg gis stong ngo // chos ni chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par
327b2('bum): shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
327b3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam
327b4('bum): par shes pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas steng ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus
327b5('bum): te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //
327b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo //
327b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshir rabs stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
328a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus
328a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen
328a3('bum): gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ngo // me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ngo //
328a4('bum): rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i kham
328a5('bum): kyis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ngo // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // ming dang gzugs ni
328a6('bum): ming dang gzugs kyis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ngo // reg pa ni reg pas stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo // sred pa ni sred
328a7('bum): pas stong ngo // len pa ni len pas stong ngo // srid pa ni srid pas stong ngo // skye ba ni skye bas stong ngo // rga shi ni rga shis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
328b1('bum): ni sbyin pa'i phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha
328b2('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gta
328b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo // phyi
328b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /
328b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus
328b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong
328b7('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa ste/
329a1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad
329a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/
329a3('bum): kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po
329a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
329a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po
329a6('bum): rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong
329a7('bum): las ni lam gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis
329b1('bum): stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
329b2('bum): rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas
329b3('bum): ba'i spoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
329b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams
329b5('bum): kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyis sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
329b6('bum): kyis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis
329b7('bum): stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
330a1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
330a2('bum): bus stong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub ni ra
330a3('bum): byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
330a4('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
330a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'chang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
330a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
330a7('bum): gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i
330b1('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
330b2('bum): pa lags sam// tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi/
330b3('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
330b4('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// 'du shes pas par bgyi ba
330b5('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
330b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes
330b7('bum): mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
331a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
331a2('bum): slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
331a3('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
331a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
331a5('bum): sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar
331a6('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// mig par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
331a7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'gag
331b1('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
331b2('bum): slob pa lags sam// rna ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
331b3('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
331b4('bum): slob pa lags sam/ rna ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// snabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
331b5('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag
331b6('bum): sam/ sna 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
331b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags
332a1('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
332a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce mi skye ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus bas par
332a3('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
332a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus mi skye bar
332a5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// yid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
332a6('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par
332a7('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ yid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
332b1('bum): slob pa lags sam// gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral
332b2('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
332b3('bum): ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// sgra bas par bgyi ba'i
332b4('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
332b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du
332b6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// dri bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
332b7('bum): sam/ dri 'dod chags dang thal bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/

333a2('bum): lugs sam// ro bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du

333a4('bum): sam/ ro mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// reg pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham
333a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg

333a7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam// chos bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chags dang thal bar

333b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

334a1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

334a5('bum): par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
334a6('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

334b1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang /

334b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bi bya ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
334b4('bum): sam// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod
334b5('bum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag saM/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na//

334b7('bum): pa lags sam// mig gi 'dus te re ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
335a1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa

335b4('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te/
335b5('bum): reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du

335b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'das te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i srad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

336a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
336a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skye

336b7('bum): gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skye bar

348a5('bum): kyi yan lag bdun bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang
348a6('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
348a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
348b1('bum): slob pa lags sam// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so//
348b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
348b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
348b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pas par
348b5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
348b6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
348b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
349a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan/
349a2('bum): bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bgyi/
349a3('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
349a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// tshad med pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
349a5('bum): lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
349a6('bum): tshad med pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ tshad med pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi
349a7('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pas par bgyi
349b1('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar
349b2('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi
349b3('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
349b4('bum): slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam par thar pa brgyad pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
349b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
349b6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/
349b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa na
350a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis
350a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis
350a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
350a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
350a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
350a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
350a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag
350b1('bum): sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
350b2('bum): pa lags sam// mngon par shes pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa
350b3('bum): rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi
350b4('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
350b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid slob pa lags sam// ting nge 'dzin rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting
350b6('bum): nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang thal bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par
350b7('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
351a1('bum): cang sakhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing du
351a2('bum): slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzung
351a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du smos
351a4('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcubs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
351a5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
351a6('bum): lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs
351a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// mi 'jigs pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
351b1('bum): rmobs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du grub pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa pan 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyu ba'i slad du sle ba na/ rnam pa thams cad
351b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'dzi
351b3('bum): ba bani mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i srad/
351b4('bum): du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang thal bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
351b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
351b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// snying rje
351b7('bum): chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
352a1('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams

352a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
352a4('bum): rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
352a5('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
352a6('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham
352a7('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang thal bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong
352b1('bum): pa lags sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
352b2('bum): 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
352b3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
352b4('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
352b5('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// phyir/
352b6('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang brag
352b7('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
353a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
353a2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags lags sam// dgra bcom pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smod pa lags sam/ dgra

353a6('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
353a7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong
353b1('bum): pa lags sam// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam
353b2('bum): pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
353b3('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
353b4('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na// rnam pa thams cad

353b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
354a1('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
354a2('bum): de ni ma yin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chag
354a3('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

354a5('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nas/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ma
354a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'du shes zad par bya ba'i
354a7('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
354b1('bum): nam/ 'du shes 'gag par bya ba'i slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
354b2('bum): slob pa yin nam// 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bya ba'i phyir slob na/
354b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed mi skye bar
354b4('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
354b5('bum): nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
354b6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
354b7('bum): mig zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
355a1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ mig 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
355a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rna ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'dod chags

355a7('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo/ lce 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham/
355b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa

355b3('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// yid
355b4('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
355b5('bum): yin nam/ yid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
355b6('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam// gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba phyir slob na
355b7('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
355b8('bum): rnam pams cad mkhyen pa nyid
356a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo// sgra zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'dod
356a2('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
356a3('bum): pa yin nam/ sgra mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dri zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
