356a6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
356a7('bum): ro 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no/
356b1('bum): reg zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
356b2('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
356b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// chos zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar
356b4('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
356b5('bum): chos mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mig gi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
356b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
356b7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
357a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
357a2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par
357a3('bum): shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
357a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sna'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par
357a5('bum): shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
357a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
357a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes bzang par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
357b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
357b2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
357b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
357b4('bum): yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya/
357b5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// yid kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
357b6('bum): pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes
357b7('bum): pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
358a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/
358a2('bum): nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
358a3('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
358a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus
358a5('bum): te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
358a6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa ma
358a7('bum): nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral
358b1('bum): khar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
358b2('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
358b3('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slab na rnam pa tham
358b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid nga slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
358b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus kyi 'dus
358b6('bum): te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob
358b7('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slo ba yin no//
359a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa

359a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad pa med pa'i
359a5('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
359a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa/
359a7('bum): yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rna ba'i 'dus te
359b1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod
359b2('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
359b3('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
359b4('bum): du slob pa yin nam// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus
359b5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
359b6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i
359b7('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
360a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral ba bya bi phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
360a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
360a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
360a4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags
360a5('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
360a6('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
360a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi
360b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
360b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi
360b3('bum): skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
360b4('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams
360b5('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
360b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// chu'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang
360b7('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob dpa
361a1('bum): skye bya bI phyir slob na/ rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// me'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
361a2('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khyams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
361a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rlung gi khams
361a4('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
361a5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
361a6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// nam mkha'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
361a7('bum): nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
361b1('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam par
361b2('bum): shes pa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i slob
361b3('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
361b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// ma rig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
361b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'gag
361b6('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
361b7('bum): 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
362a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed mi skye
362a2('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no//
362a3('bum): rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
362a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// ming dang gzugs
362a5('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
362a6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs bgag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs mi skye bar bya ba
362a7('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// skye mched drug zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye
362b1('bum): mched drug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
362b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir
362b3('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin na/
362b4('bum): reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
362b5('bum): yin nam// tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
362b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
362b7('bum): na dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sred bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ sred pa 'dod
363a1('bum): @chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ sred pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
363a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sred pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// len pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham
363a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa 'gag par
363a4('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// srid
363a5('bum): ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
363a6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
363a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// skye ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
363b1('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
363b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob na/ rga shi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
363b3('bum): banyid du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
363b4('bum): nam/ nA shi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu
363b5('bum): slob pa yin nam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod
363b6('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
363b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin po'i byin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
364a1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
364a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
364a3('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa phan ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
364a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas
364a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
364a6('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
364a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no/
364b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi
364b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
364b3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
364b4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
364b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
364b6('bum): skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
364b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
365a1('bum): nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha
365a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams
365a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
365a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
365a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// phyi stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi
365a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sgo
365a7('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na/ byi stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
365b1('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
365b2('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byi nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
365b3('bum): yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i
365b4('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
365b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid
365b6('bum): stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// chen po stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
365b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
366a1('bum): yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid
366a2('bum): mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// don dam pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
366a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
366a4('bum): don bla stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
366a5('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'dus byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
366a6('bum): pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas
366a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnab
366b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
366b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
366b3('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma thams cad stong pa nyid mi skye ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
366b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
366b5('bum): ba yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha'
366b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar
366b7('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thas
367a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa bam
367a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
367a3('bum): nam/ bog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dor ba med pa stong pa
367a4('bum): nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir
367a5('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
367a6('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rang bzhin stong
367a7('bum): pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
367b1('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
367b2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// chos thams cad stong pa
367b3('bum): nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
367b4('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
367b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rang gi
367b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang /
367b7('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
368a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
368a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi dmigs
368a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
368a4('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
368a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
368a6('bum): nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
368a7('bum): 'geg par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
368b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
368b2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa tham
368b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dngos po med pa'i
368b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral
368b5('bum): bar bya ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
368b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
368b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba ni zad par bya ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar
369a1('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
369a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no//
369a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral
369a4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
369a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rdzu
369a6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
369a7('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
369b1('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dbang po lnga zad par
369b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
369b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga mi skye bar bya ba'i
369b4('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir snga
369b5('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na
369b6('bum): stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
369b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub
370a1('bum): kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ byang chub kyi yan la/
370a2('bum): bdun 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
370a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
370a4('bum): nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i
370a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag pa bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi skye bar bya ba
370a6('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
370a7('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bani 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i
370b1('bum): bden pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
370b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bsam gtan bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam ga
370b3('bum): bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
370b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// tshad me
370b5('bum): ba bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
370b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad med
370b7('bum): pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na
371a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir
371a2('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
371a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam
371a4('bum): bar thar pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
371a5('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
371a6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
371a7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chag
371b1('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir srog
371b2('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
371b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
371b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
371b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
371b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
371b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mngon par shes pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/
372a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon
372a2('bum): par shes pa rnams la 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
372a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// ting nge 'dzin rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
372a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par
372a5('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
372a6('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams

372b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// de bzhin

380a1('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/
380a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid
380a3('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba
380a4('bum): 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhi ni nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sangs
380a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba'i/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i/
380a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'i/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'gyur ram/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad
380a7('bum): pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba la
380b1('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang chub kyi de
380b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
380b3('bum): zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba
380b4('bum): 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//
380b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam
380b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/ de bzhin nyid zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
380b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa
381a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul
381a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/
381a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
381a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi
381a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob
381a6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo stong pa
381a7('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
381b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la
381b2('bum): slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
381b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mtha' las 'das
381b4('bum): ba stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de
381b5('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
381b6('bum): ni rang bzhin steng pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
381b7('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
382a1('bum): dpa' chen po ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dngos po med pa stong
382a2('bum): pa nyid la slab pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
382a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran
382a4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'bor
382a5('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
382a6('bum): chen po ni dbang po lnga slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
382a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'phags
382b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
382b2('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
382b3('bum): tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob
382b4('bum): ba yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
382b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
382b6('bum): ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
382b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de
383a1('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
383a2('bum): dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/
383a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
383a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
383a5('bum): slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sem
383a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
383a7('bum): bul slob pa yin/ rab 'byor 'byor de kar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dgra bcom pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i bya /
383b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang byang chub la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni las kyi rnam pa shes
383b2('bum): pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de
383b3('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
383b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam bdud kyi lha rnams kyi pham par mi nus pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
383b5('bum): dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi ba de bzhin gshegs
383b6('bum): pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
383b7('bum): de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de
384a1('bum): 'anam ca / pa byang namasam su dpa sems dpang dzin panas nam gyi na ma
384a2('bum): dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/
384a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa
384a4('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar
384a5('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
384a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpal
384a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te/ rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen
384b1('bum): po 'di la bslab par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni sems can thams cad
384b2('bum): 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thon sems
384b3('bum): dmyal bar mi gyur/ khyil sang gi skye gnas su mi skyen// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi bya'o// yul mtha' 'khob du mi skye'o/
384b4('bum): yul cad rong can du mi skyer/ phyag dang ba dang / gdos pa'i rigs su mi skye'o/ nar bar mi 'gyur ro/
384b5('bum): sgur por mi 'gyur ro// zha bor mi 'gyur ro// yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro// 'on par mi 'gyur ro//
384b6('bum): ga pa med par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/ dbang po yongs su chang shing dbang pos
384b7('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// srod gcod par mi 'gyur ro// ma byin pa len par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem par mi 'gyur ro//
385a1('bum): brdzun du smra bar mi 'gyur ro// za ma can du mi 'gyur ro// zhes gcod par smra bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig khyal
385a2('bum): can du mi 'gyur ro// chags sems can du mi 'gyur ro// gnod sems can du mi 'gyur ro// log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro// 'tsho ba log pas
385a3('bum): 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su
385a4('bum): 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
385a5('bum): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta
385a6('bum): bu de la yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las/ thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/
385a7('bum): thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms
385b1('bum): par 'jug/ tshad med pa rnams la snyoms bar 'du/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
385b2('bum): pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
385b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
385b4('bum): mapa 'i mam ni yi/ na sa dang / sa
385b5('bum): yongs su dgapa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa masakyistobs yongs su
385b6('bum): par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das cho thams /
387a1('bum): yongs su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gis yongs su dag
387a2('bum): pa thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du
387a3('bum): smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag
387a4('bum): pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing 'god pa med pa de ni/
387a5('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni/ chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas sems
387a6('bum): can de dag gi don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
387b1('bum): spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes
387b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/
387b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha'
387b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
387b5('bum): spod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med
387b6('bum): po stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la
388a1('bum): spyod/ yang dag par spong bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/
388a2('bum): stobs lnga la spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
388a3('bum): la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ chad med pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/ rnams par
388a4('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
388a5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo
388a6('bum): rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod/ mi 'dzegs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa na
388b1('bum): la spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir
388b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
388b3('bum): la spyod/ rnams po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do// rab 'byor de ltar slob po'i byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po na/
388b4('bum): chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu ma thob par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byor
388b5('bum): de ltar slobs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams kyi
388b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyis le snam 'byung ba de
388b7('bum): lta bu ni nying ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la spobs pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/
389a1('bum): sems can gang / nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas
389a2('bum): ches mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa de
389a3('bum): lha ni nyung ngo // sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las/ yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab
389a4('bum): 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos
389a5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo // rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
389a6('bum): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
389a7('bum): po gang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
389b1('bum): la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo // rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
389b2('bum): mo 'di la spyod cing / the tsom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i gnon pa de dag pas ni/ gang phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo //
389b3('bum): rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar
389b4('bum): rgud par 'dod pas/ shas ba kyi rab tu phyin pa za'am 'di kyi la bsgru ba per bya'o// yang gzhan byung semams
389b5('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'khrug pa
389b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// le lo dang ldan ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// shes rab 'chal ba dang ldan pa'i
389b7('bum): sems mi skye'o// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// zab
390a1('bum): / dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du shes
390a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rmi dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna
390a3('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lce dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid
390a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sgra dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dri dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ro
390a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// reg dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chos dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems
390a6('bum): mi skye'o// rna ba'i rnam por shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan po'i sems mi skye'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dang
390a7('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
390b1('bum): mig 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems
390b2('bum): mi skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i
390b3('bum): sems mi skye'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems
390b4('bum): mi skye'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
390b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sa'i
390b6('bum): khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chu'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// me'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rlung gi khams dang
390b7('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ma rig pa dang
391a1('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
391a2('bum): ming dang gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// skye mched drug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshor ba dang ldan
391a3('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// len pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// srid pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// skye ba dang ldan
391a4('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o// rga shi dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
391a5('bum): phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems
391a6('bum): mi skye'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// nang stong pa
391a7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// stong pa nyid
391b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
391b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
391b3('bum): sems mi skye'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rang bzhin stong
391b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
391b5('bum): mi skye'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ses mi skye'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
391b6('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi
391b7('bum): skye'o// yang dag par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
392a1('bum): / stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
392a2('bum): brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chad med pa
392a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
392a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med
392a5('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang
392a6('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// so so yang
392a7('bum): dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
392b1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
392b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dgra bcom nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rang byang chub dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang
392b3('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i sems mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
392b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang dmigs pa med do// ma dmigs pas/ chos gang la yang
392b5('bum): sems bskyed pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams
392b6('bum): cad yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyuraro//
392b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
393a1('bum): dper na/ 'jig tshogs la lta bar lta ba rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus par 'gyur ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin
393a2('bum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu dus byas par 'gyur ba'i
393a3('bum): 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
393a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
393a5('bum): dpa' chen po// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab
393a6('bum): 'byor shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la
393a7('bum): slob pa yin no// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang
393b1('bum): ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang
393b2('bum): mang ba lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
393b3('bum): 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na
393b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang sku tshe'i mthar
393b5('bum): phyin gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rgyan ma chad par na bza' dang / soso snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi
393b6('bum): rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
393b7('bum): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas
394a1('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
394a2('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan tu byed na/ de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
394a3('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bla na med pa
394a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi/ bla na med par 'gyur
394a5('bum): bar 'dod pa dang / sems can 'gon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ba dang / skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / gnas med pa
394a6('bum): rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi mig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar
394a7('bum): 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'khor du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
394b1('bum): sang+yas kyi seng ge'i nga ro spags par 'dod pa dang /
394b2('bum): rol pas rnam par brtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga gardung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtam
394b3('bum): bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
394b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni/ yun gsum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi ma thob pa gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
394b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par
394b6('bum): bgyi ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun gsum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya/ rang sangs rgyas
394b7('bum): kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya ste/ de la gnas par mi bya/ 'dug par mi bya'i/ shes pa dang mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/
394b8('bum): 'da' bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
395a1('bum): byabya// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/
395a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
395a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas
395a4('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil kyi mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa
395a5('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
395a6('bum): spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bral ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'
395a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du
395b1('bum): byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
395b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smrab par bya'o snyam ste/ gal te de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
395b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do// zhes bya bar shes pa med do// gang gi shes
395b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'byung ste/ bla na med pa yang
395b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par ma tshang rgya ba de lta bu yang / mi shes mi mthong zhing de 'di snyam du sems te chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin
395b6('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod pa yang ma/
395b7('bum): yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni/ chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang med do zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
396a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/
396a2('bum): le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyams du sems par gyur te/ 'di la byang chub sems
396a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
396a4('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
396a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
396a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
396a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
396b1('bum): pa nyid la'ang spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
396b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang // bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
396b3('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
396b4('bum): rnam mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa la yang spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
396b5('bum): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
396b6('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang spyod bzhi du sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
396b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na lta ci smos/ sems can gang gi sems can rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de/
397a1('bum): dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing / de dag 'tsho ba yang legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par
397a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/ sems can gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab
397a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyams nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man d+ha ra ba mang po
397a4('bum): blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ me tog man d+ha ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
397a5('bum): sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// de ltar gtor te mngon par gtor ba dang / rab tu gtor ba byas nas/ tshig 'di skad
397a6('bum): ces brjod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa gang gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de
397a7('bum): dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang byung gi
397b1('bum): chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub
397b2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba
397b3('bum): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog ste/ nyan thog sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar
397b4('bum): sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing yang dang yang du/ bla na med par dag
397b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas bI
397b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi don du mos/ sman par mos/ bde bar mos shing legs par bgyi bar mos te/ sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sem
397b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni 'di ltar rtog ste/ ci bdag rgal nas sems can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag grol nas sems
398a1('bum): can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag dbugs byin nas sems can dbugs ma byung ba rnams/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur
398a2('bum): ram/ ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zla bar 'gyur/ ram/ zhes rtog par
398a3('bum): bgyid pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su
398a4('bum): yid rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar
398a5('bum): bgyid pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yid rang bar bgyid pa dang /
398a6('bum): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yid rang bar bgyid na/ rigs kyi
398a7('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
398b1('bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag
398b2('bum): gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar
398b3('bum): rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni chad do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni
398b4('bum): skra'i rtse mo yi tshad kyis/ tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do//
398b5('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i ched kyis tshad bzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang
398b6('bum): ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnam
398b7('bum): la/ chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pas blang ba'i tshad kyis/ chad bzung bar rung
399a1('bum): yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// de skad ces bka'
399a2('bum): stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi
399a3('bum): rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la/ rjes su yid rung bar mi
399a4('bum): bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can
399a5('bum): de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
399a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu rab tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
399a7('bum): tu sems bskyed pa'i sems bsgrubs pas ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa ste/ gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su btang ba dang /
